Class Rent

java.lang.Object
Maman12.Rent
public class Rent extends Object
class Rent is used for represent a Rent object.
Version:
2023A
Author:
Liron Abutbul

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Rent(String name, Car car, Date pick, Date ret)
    Creates a new Rent object The return date must be at least one day after the pickup date, otherwise set it to one day after the pick up date.
    Rent(Rent other)
    Copy constructor

    overlap(Rent other)
    Check if there is a double listing of a rent for the same person and car with an overlap in the rental days If there is - return a new rent object with the unified dates, otherwise - return null.

    upgrade(Car newCar)
    Try to upgrade the car to a better car If the given car is better than the current car of the rent, upgrade it and return the upgrade additional cost, otherwise - don't upgrade

  • Constructor Details

    • Rent

      public Rent(String name, Car car, Date pick, Date ret)
      Creates a new Rent object The return date must be at least one day after the pickup date, otherwise set it to one day after the pick up date.
      Parameters:
      name - the client's name
      car - the rented car
      pick - the pickup date
      ret - the return date

    • setPickDate

      public void setPickDate(Date pickDate)
      Sets the pick up date The pick up date must be at least one day before the return date, otherwise - don't change the pick up date
      Parameters:
      pickDate - the pick up date (You can assume that pick up date is not null)

    • setReturnDate

      public void setReturnDate(Date returnDate)
      Sets the return date The return date must be at least one day after the pick up date, otherwise - don't change the return date
      Parameters:
      returnDate - the return date (You can assume that return date is not null)

    • upgrade

      public int upgrade(Car newCar)
      Try to upgrade the car to a better car If the given car is better than the current car of the rent, upgrade it and return the upgrade additional cost, otherwise - don't upgrade
      Parameters:
      newCar - the car to upgrade to
      Returns:
      the upgrade cost

    • overlap

      public Rent overlap(Rent other)
      Check if there is a double listing of a rent for the same person and car with an overlap in the rental days If there is - return a new rent object with the unified dates, otherwise - return null.
      Parameters:
      other - the other rent
      Returns:
      the unified rent or null

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a String that represents this rent
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String that represents this rent in the following format: Name:Rama From:30/10/2022 To:12/11/2022 Type:B Days:13 Price:1845
